title: With Leaps and Bounds, Parkour Athletes Turn Off the Lights in Paris
description: As an energy crisis looms, nimble young activists are using superhero-like moves to switch off wasteful lights that stores leave on all night.
dc:creator: Constant Méheut
media:credit: Mauricio Lima for The New York Times
media:description: Kevin Ha, 30, left, leader of the On The Spot Parkour collective in Paris, climbs a wall to turn off a shop’s exterior lights on the Avenue des Champs-Élysées, in September.
